itemInfo.itemDesc:
Special dish with fresh seafood and vegetable. 
- Unique effect: Casting Speed Rank +1 for 45min
- How to Obtain : Can be cooked at your residence.
- Cooldown : 30min

item.name: White Sauce
item.desc:
A white sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Stir-Fried Seafood

item.name: Squid
item.desc: An ingredient that can be sold to a Trader or used in Cooking. It can be obtained through Fishing.\n- Usage: Seafood Pasta, Stir Fried Seafood, Seafood Mushroom Salad, etc.

item.name: Hot Pepper
item.desc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by Farming.
Usage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Stir Fried Meat, etc.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Farming Hot Pepper Seeds in a Garden.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but will cause pain.

item.name: Cabbage
item.desc: A plump cabbage used as an ingredient in Cooking.\nUsage: Stir-Fried Vegetables, Fried Vegetables, etc.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Gathered from Cabbage using Bare Hands.

item.name: White Sauce
item.desc:
A white sauce used for Cooking.

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Usage: Stir-Fried Seafood
